reference.title: DITAVAL-reference domain element
reference.shortdesc: The DITAVAL reference domain is used to reference a DITAVAL file that contains conditions that apply only to a subset of a DITA map. It also can be used to replicate a subset of a DITA map for multiple audiences.The child topics here all refer to a "map branch implied by a ditavalref" – we should probably define "implied" as a term in this case, that we can easily refer to (or if we already define it, uses of the phrase "implied by a ditavalref" should link there).
